Html:
Can someone kindly provide me with the URL where I can find the AdventureWorks2008 OLTP Schema Diagram?

I found the one for 2005 (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=0f6e0bcf-a1b5-4760-8d79-67970f93d5ff&displaylang=en), but not for 2008.

Thanks.

The most recently checked-in copies of the schema diagrams are here: http://www.codeplex.com/MSFTDBProdSamples/SourceControl/DirectoryView.aspx?SourcePath=%24%2fMSFTDBProdSamples%2fKatmai_August2008_RTM%2fSchema%20Diagrams&changeSetId=17006

Thanks for pointing out that we need to link 'em up from the wiki.

Thanks for the URL.  When I went to the site, however, I noticed that the Visio (.vsd) versions were not available.  Is there another URL I can go to in order to view/download them?

Thanks again.

For some reason CodePlex blocks the download of Office file types.

However, all of the diagrams are included in the AdventureWorks installers and ZIP files.

I have downloaded:

  • SQL2008.AdventureWorks_OLTP_DB_v2008.x86.msi
  • SQL2008.All_Product_Samples_Without_DBs.x86.msi
  • SQL2008.AdventureWorks_OLTP_DB_v2008.zip

and have been unable to find any of the schema diagrams.

Is there another file that I need to download from CodePlex in order to obtain all of the diagrams (including the Visio versions)?

Thanks.

Doh! I've posted the current versions of the VSDs as attachments to the schema diagrams page for now.

http://www.codeplex.com/MSFTDBProdSamples/Wiki/Info.aspx?title=AWSchemaDiag&action=Info

Will make sure that they do get included in the MSIs and ZIPs for the Halloween samples refresh. Thanks for the info, emerald77.
